pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, July 4, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, July 4, 2017:

Dublin, Ireland

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will meet with the Taoiseach of Ireland, Leo Varadkar.

Farmleigh House, Castleknock
Dublin, Ireland

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold an expanded bilateral meeting with the Taoiseach of Ireland.

Farmleigh House, Castleknock
Dublin, Ireland

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with the Taoiseach of Ireland.

Farmleigh House, Castleknock
Dublin, Ireland

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

11:05 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Youth Gaelic Football and Hurling Demonstration.

Farmleigh House, Castleknock
Dublin, Ireland

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Business Roundtable at the Royal College of Physicians.

Royal College of Physicians

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will visit the Famine Sculptures at Custom House Quay and EPIC The Irish Emigration Museum.

Note for media:

  • Open coverage for Famine Sculptures and Pool photo opportunity inside the Museum

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will meet with the President of Ireland, Michael D. Higgins, and Mrs. Higgins.

The State Dining Room
Residence of the President of Ireland

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

7:20 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will arrive at Dublin Castle and be greeted by the Taoiseach of Ireland.

Dublin Castle

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

8:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will attend a dinner given by the Taoiseach of Ireland.

Dublin Castle

Note for media:

  • Open coverage for opening remarks only

 

Note: all times local
